sentences.en: Anyone who betrays his motherland shall inevitably fall into the abyss of eternal sin and shame.
sentences.cn: 一切出卖祖国的人都必将堕入永远被人唾骂的罪恶深渊.

sentences.en: In the way you go on, you are inevitably coming apart.
sentences.cn: 照你们这样下去, 毫无疑问是会散伙的.

sentences.en: Industrialization inevitably led to the expansion of the urban working class.
sentences.cn: 工业化不可避免地导致了城市工人阶级人数的增多.

sentences.en: Inevitably the repair job was not quite so simple.
sentences.cn: 照例,修理工作并非如此简单.

sentences.en: Inevitably the transition will yield some sticky moments.
sentences.cn: 过渡时期难免会出现一些困难的时候。

sentences.en: Inevitably those who suffer the most are the mothers and children.
sentences.cn: 妇女和儿童必然是最遭罪的。

sentences.en: Inevitably, a quarrel followed between the two sides.
sentences.cn: 双方随后不可避免地争吵起来.

sentences.en: Inevitably, the press exaggerated the story.
sentences.cn: 新闻界照例又夸大了这件事。

sentences.en: Inevitably, the situation did not please everyone.
sentences.cn: 这种状况必定不能让所有人都感到满意。

sentences.en: Most modern housing estates are terrible and inevitably done on the cheap.
sentences.cn: 现在的房子大多质量差劲透顶，肯定都是偷工减料盖起来的。

sentences.en: Older cars inevitably lack the latest safety refinements.
sentences.cn: 老款的汽车难免缺少经过改进的最新安全保护装置。

sentences.en: The conversation inevitably turned to the changes that had taken place in the village.
sentences.cn: 话题不可避免地转到谈村子里发生的变化.

sentences.en: The decision will inevitably lead to political tensions.
sentences.cn: 该决定必然导致政治局势的紧张。

sentences.en: The recent political incident will inevitably count against the peace process of the two countries.
sentences.cn: 最近发生的这一政治事件无疑会影响两国的和平进程.

sentences.en: The report has inevitably been greeted with scepticism.
sentences.cn: 那份报告不可避免地受到了质疑。

sentences.en: These tests will inevitably be used by politicians to make cheap political points.
sentences.cn: 这些测试必然会被政客们不失时机地拿去大做政治文章。

sentences.en: This would inevitably involve his departure from the post of Prime Minister.
sentences.cn: 这将不可避免地导致他辞去首相一职。

trans.tran_en: used for saying that something is certain to happen and cannot be avoided
